thread.title: Sofia Vergara’s wedding gown by Zuhair Murad
thread.title_full: Sofia Vergara’s wedding gown by Zuhair Murad - Bangalore Mirror

author: bangaloremirror.com
title: Sofia Vergara’s wedding gown by Zuhair Murad
text:
Modern Family star Sofia Vergara, who is all set to tie the knot with Magic Mike actor Joe Manganiello, will wear a wedding gown designed by Lebanese fashion designer Zuhair Murad. The Latin actress, who has been known to favour Murad for her many striking red carpet turns for the Golden Globes and Emmys over the years, will wear a custom-made, fairy-tale frock for her upcoming nuptials.
Other details about the dress haven't been revealed yet. Vergara and Manganiello got engaged in Hawaii in December last year and will walk down the aisle at Florida's Breakers resort in Palm Beach on November 22. In a recent interview, the bride-to-be discussed the many challenges the couple faced while planning the wedding, the first one being narrowing down the guest list. Vergara said that the guest list number is around 400, joking, "200 are, like, my family." The pair recently sent out luxurious invitations for the affair. "They're classy and white," a source claims.
